verses.verse: וַֽיִּגְּשׁ֗וּ <S%H5066><s%> Then came near רָאשֵׁי֙ <S%H7218><s%> the heads אֲב֣וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶלְעָזָר֙ <S%H499><s%> unto Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> and unto Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נ֑וּן <S%H5126><s%> of Nun וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to רָאשֵׁ֛י <S%H7218><s%> and unto the heads אֲב֥וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <S%H4294><s%> of the tribes לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיְדַבְּר֨וּ <S%H1696><s%> And they spake אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> to בְּשִׁלֹ֗ה <S%H7887><s%> unto them at Shiloh בְּאֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנַ֙עַן֙ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded בְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses לָֽתֶת־ <S%H5414><s%> to give לָ֥נוּ עָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> us cities לָשָׁ֑בֶת <S%H3427><s%> to dwell in וּמִגְרְשֵׁיהֶ֖ן <S%H4054><s%> with the suburbs לִבְהֶמְתֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H929><s%> thereof for our cattle

וַיִּתְּנ֨וּ <S%H5414><s%> gave בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַלְוִיִּ֛ם <S%H3881><s%> unto the Levites מִנַּחֲלָתָ֖ם <S%H5159><s%> out of their inheritance אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> according פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> at the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶעָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> these cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרְשֵׁיהֶֽן׃ <S%H4054><s%> and their suburbs

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> came out הַגּוֹרָ֖ל <S%H1486><s%> And the lot לְמִשְׁפְּחֹ֣ת <S%H4940><s%> for the families הַקְּהָתִ֑י <S%H6956><s%> of the Kohathites וַיְהִ֡י <S%H1961><s%> received לִבְנֵי֩ <S%H1121><s%> and the children אַהֲרֹ֨ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> were of הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> [which were] of the Levites מִמַּטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> out of the tribe יְ֠הוּדָה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּמִמַּטֵּ֨ה <S%H4294><s%> and out of the tribe הַשִּׁמְעֹנִ֜י <S%H8099><s%> of Simeon וּמִמַּטֵּ֤ה <S%H4294><s%> and out of the tribe בִנְיָמִן֙ <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin בַּגּוֹרָ֔ל <S%H1486><s%> had by lot עָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> cities שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three עֶשְׂרֵֽה׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten ס

וְלִבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> of the children קְהָ֜ת <S%H6955><s%> of Kohath הַנּוֹתָרִ֗ים <S%H3498><s%> And the rest מִמִּשְׁפְּחֹ֣ת <S%H4940><s%> out of the families מַטֵּֽה־ <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe אֶ֠פְרַיִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim וּֽמִמַּטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> and out of the tribe דָ֞ן <S%H1835><s%> of Dan וּמֵחֲצִ֨י <S%H2677><s%> and out of the half מַטֵּ֧ה <S%H4294><s%> tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֛ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh בַּגּוֹרָ֖ל <S%H1486><s%> [had] by lot עָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> cities עָֽשֶׂר׃ <S%H6235><s%> ten ס

וְלִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children גֵרְשׁ֗וֹן <S%H1648><s%> of Gershon מִמִּשְׁפְּח֣וֹת <S%H4940><s%> out of the families מַטֵּֽה־ <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe יִשָּׂשכָ֣ר <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar וּמִמַּטֵּֽה־ <S%H4294><s%> and out of the tribe אָ֠שֵׁר <S%H836><s%> of Asher וּמִמַּטֵּ֨ה <S%H4294><s%> and out of the tribe נַפְתָּלִ֜י <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali וּ֠מֵחֲצִי <S%H2677><s%> and out of the half מַטֵּ֨ה <S%H4294><s%> tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֤ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh בַבָּשָׁן֙ <S%H1316><s%> in Bashan בַּגּוֹרָ֔ל <S%H1486><s%> [had] by lot עָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> cities שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three עֶשְׂרֵֽה׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten ס

לִבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> The children מְרָרִ֜י <S%H4847><s%> of Merari לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֗ם <S%H4940><s%> by their families מִמַּטֵּ֨ה <S%H4294><s%> [had] out of the tribe רְאוּבֵ֤ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben וּמִמַּטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> and out of the tribe גָד֙ <S%H1410><s%> of Gad וּמִמַּטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> and out of the tribe זְבוּלֻ֔ן <S%H2074><s%> of Zebulun עָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> cities שְׁתֵּ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵֽה׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> gave בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> unto the Levites אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶעָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> these cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרְשֵׁיהֶ֑ן <S%H4054><s%> with their suburbs כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֧ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses בַּגּוֹרָֽל׃ <S%H1486><s%> by lot פ

וַֽיִּתְּנ֗וּ <S%H5414><s%> And they gave מִמַּטֵּה֙ <S%H4294><s%> out of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּמִמַּטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> and out of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children שִׁמְע֑וֹן <S%H8095><s%> of Simeon אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> הֶֽעָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> these cities הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> which are [here] mentioned אֶתְהֶ֖ן <S%H853><s%> בְּשֵֽׁם׃ <S%H8034><s%> by name

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> were for לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Which the children אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron מִמִּשְׁפְּח֥וֹת <S%H4940><s%> [being] of the families הַקְּהָתִ֖י <S%H6956><s%> of the Kohathites מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> [who were] of the children לֵוִ֑י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לָהֶ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> was theirs הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַגּוֹרָ֖ל <S%H1486><s%> lot רִיאשֹׁנָֽה׃ <S%H7223><s%> first

וַיִּתְּנ֨וּ <S%H5414><s%> And they gave לָהֶ֜ם <S%H1992><s%> like אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קִרְיַת֩ אַרְבַּ֨ע <S%H7153><s%> Kiriath-arba אֲבִ֧י <S%H1><s%> the father הָֽעֲנ֛וֹק <S%H6061><s%> of Anak הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> which חֶבְר֖וֹן <S%H2275><s%> which [city is] Hebron בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> in the hill יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> [country] of Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for מִגְרָשֶׁ֖הָ <S%H4054><s%> with the suburbs סְבִיבֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5439><s%> thereof round about

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׂדֵ֥ה <S%H7704><s%> But the fields הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲצֵרֶ֑יהָ <S%H2691><s%> and the villages נָֽתְנ֛וּ <S%H5414><s%> thereof gave לְכָלֵ֥ב <S%H3612><s%> they to Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְפֻנֶּ֖ה <S%H3312><s%> of Jephunneh בַּאֲחֻזָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H272><s%> for his possession ס

וְלִבְנֵ֣י ׀ <S%H1121><s%> to the children אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest נָֽתְנוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> Thus they gave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> [to be] a city מִקְלַ֣ט <S%H4733><s%> of refuge הָרֹצֵ֔חַ <S%H7523><s%> for the slayer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֶבְר֖וֹן <S%H2275><s%> Hebron וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרָשֶׁ֑הָ <S%H4054><s%> with her suburbs וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לִבְנָ֖ה <S%H3841><s%> and Libnah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרָשֶֽׁהָ׃ <S%H4054><s%> with her suburbs

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יַתִּר֙ <S%H3492><s%> And Jattir וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרָשֶׁ֔הָ <S%H4054><s%> with her suburbs וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶשְׁתְּמֹ֖עַ <S%H851><s%> and Eshtemoa וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרָשֶֽׁהָ׃ <S%H4054><s%> with her suburbs

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֹלֹן֙ <S%H2473><s%> And Holon וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרָשֶׁ֔הָ <S%H4054><s%> with her suburbs וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבִ֖ר <S%H1688><s%> and Debir וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרָשֶֽׁהָ׃ <S%H4054><s%> with her suburbs

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַ֣יִן <S%H5871><s%> And Ain וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרָשֶׁ֗הָ <S%H4054><s%> with her suburbs וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֻטָּה֙ <S%H3194><s%> and Juttah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרָשֶׁ֔הָ <S%H4054><s%> with her suburbs אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית שֶׁ֖מֶשׁ <S%H1053><s%> [and] Bethshemesh וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרָשֶׁ֑הָ <S%H4054><s%> with her suburbs עָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> cities תֵּ֔שַׁע <S%H8672><s%> nine מֵאֵ֕ת <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> out of those two הַשְּׁבָטִ֖ים <S%H7626><s%> tribes הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these פ

וּמִמַּטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> And out of the tribe בִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גִּבְע֖וֹן <S%H1391><s%> Gibeon וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרָשֶׁ֑הָ <S%H4054><s%> with her suburbs אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גֶּ֖בַע <S%H1387><s%> Geba וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרָשֶֽׁהָ׃ <S%H4054><s%> with her suburbs

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲנָתוֹת֙ <S%H6068><s%> Anathoth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרָשֶׁ֔הָ <S%H4054><s%> with her suburbs וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַלְמ֖וֹן <S%H5960><s%> and Almon וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרָשֶׁ֑הָ <S%H4054><s%> with her suburbs עָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> cities אַרְבַּֽע׃ <S%H702><s%> four

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> All the cities בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron הַכֹּֽהֲנִ֑ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests שְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> three עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <S%H6240><s%> ten עָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> cities וּמִגְרְשֵׁיהֶֽן׃ <S%H4054><s%> with their suburbs ס

וּלְמִשְׁפְּח֤וֹת <S%H4940><s%> And the families בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children קְהָת֙ <S%H6955><s%> of Kohath הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites הַנּוֹתָרִ֖ים <S%H3498><s%> which remained מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children קְהָ֑ת <S%H6955><s%> of Kohath וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> Then עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> even they had the cities גֽוֹרָלָ֔ם <S%H1486><s%> of their lot מִמַּטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> out of the tribe אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim

וַיִּתְּנ֨וּ <S%H5414><s%> For they gave לָהֶ֜ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עִ֨יר <S%H5892><s%> [to be] a city מִקְלַ֧ט <S%H4733><s%> of refuge הָרֹצֵ֛חַ <S%H7523><s%> for the slayer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁכֶ֥ם <S%H7927><s%> them Shechem וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרָשֶׁ֖הָ <S%H4054><s%> with her suburbs בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גֶּ֖זֶר <S%H1507><s%> and Gezer וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרָשֶֽׁהָ׃ <S%H4054><s%> with her suburbs

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קִבְצַ֙יִם֙ <S%H6911><s%> And Kibzaim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרָשֶׁ֔הָ <S%H4054><s%> with her suburbs וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית חוֹרֹ֖ן <S%H1032><s%> and Bethhoron וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְרָשֶׁ֑הָ <S%H4054><s%> with her suburbs עָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> cities אַרְבַּֽע׃ <S%H702><s%> four ס
